languages.text:
{g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Voidship Ram{/g} causes {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g}, with the number of fires depending on the size of the target.
The voidship itself suffers −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} when ramming.

languages.text:
Таран вызывает у цели {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}внутренние пожары{/g}, количество пожаров зависит от размера цели.
Сам корабль получает на −50% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g} при таране.

languages.text:
{g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}舰船撞角{/g}的撞击会导致目标爆发{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}内部火灾{/g}，火灾数量取决于目标尺寸。
进行撞角撞击时，虚空舰本身受到的{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%。

languages.text:
{g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Raumschiff-Rammbock{/g} verursacht {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}interne Brände{/g}. Die Zahl der Brände hängt von der Größe des Ziels ab.
Das Raumschiff selbst erleidet während des Rammvorgangs −50 % weniger {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.

languages.text:
Le {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}bélier du vaisseau{/g} provoque des {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendies internes{/g}, dont le nombre dépend de la taille de la cible.
Le vaisseau subit 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en moins lorsqu'il utilise le bélier.

languages.text:

La propia nave del vacío sufre un −50 % menos de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} al embestir.

languages.text:

ヴォイドシップが突撃時に受ける{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が−50%減少する。

languages.text:
{g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Uçsuz Gemisi Koçbaşı Vuruşu{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}iç yangınlara{/g} sebep olur. Yangınların sayısı, hedefin boyutuna göre değişir.
Uçsuz gemisinin kendisi de koçbaşı vuruşundan %50 daha az {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alır.
